ingredients: 500g Boneless Chicken Thighs: Cut in to strips roughly 5mm wide and 2cm long
10 Garlic Cloves: Ground into a paste
50g Fresh Ginger: Peeled and sliced in to 3 cm long batons as thin as you can get them
